# Preprocessing

```{r}
library(dplyr)
experiment = readRDS("/Users/martinemons/polybox/Universitaet/MSc_CBB/HS2020/Statistical Analysis of HSD/vdj-analysis-local/sce_B.rds", refhook = NULL)
cellUMI2SampleType = colData(experiment) %>% as.data.frame %>% select(lib_id, patient_id, Sample.Type, Diagnosis) %>% unique()
```

Command to run bracer in docker container for one demultiplexed fasta file
`docker run -it --rm -v $PWD:/scratch -w /scratch teichlab/bracer assemble TCGCGTTAGTACTTGC out --assembled_file TCGCGTTAGTACTTGC.fasta`
This command can be executed in e.g. `project-vdj-analysis/data/demultiplexed/IJ014B_POOL1-preprocessed`

`docker run -it --rm -v $PWD:/scratch -w /scratch teichlab/bracer summarise out`
